mapper.insert: insert into t_server_commpany (name, info, address, gps, scale, createdate, joindate, flag, type, linkman, phone) values (#{name}, #{info}, #{address}, #{gps}, #{scale}, #{createdate}, #{joindate}, #{flag}, #{type}, #{linkman}, #{phone});
mapper.select: select tsc.id tsc_id, tsc.name tsc_name, tsc.info tsc_info, tsc.address tsc_address, tsc.gps tsc_gps, tsc.scale tsc_scale, tsc.createdate tsc_createdate, tsc.joindate tsc_joindate, tsc.flag tsc_flag, tsc.type tsc_type, tsc.linkman tsc_linkman, tsc.phone tsc_phone, tm.id tm_id, tm.level tm_level, tm.price tm_price, tm.day tm_day, ta.id ta_id, ta.path ta_path, ta.filename ta_filename, ta.type ta_type, (select count(0) from t_user where companyid = tsc.id) as tsc_zzhLength from t_server_commpany tsc left join t_member_commpany tmc on tsc.id = tmc.commpanyid left join t_member tm on tm.id = tmc.memberid left join t_annex ta on tsc.id = ta.keyid where (ta.tabletype is null or ta.tabletype = 2) and tsc.id = #{id} and (tmc.startdate is null or now() >= tmc.startdate) and (tmc.enddate is null or now() <= tmc.enddate)
